item.title: GeeCon - Randomized testing
item.description: GeeCon - Randomized testing # I arrived late during lunch time on Thursday for GeeCon â€“ however just in time to listen to one of the most interesting talks when it comes to testing. Did you ever have the issue of writing code that runs well in your development environment but crashes as soon as it’s rolled out at customers only to find out that their Locale setting was causing the issues?
